design_goals: Create a clean, minimalist aesthetic with subtle natural elements.
Ensure intuitive user interaction with SYS and TEMPLATE sources.
Establish thematic cohesion across all UI elements.

logo_concept.name: Synergy Weave
logo_concept.description: A minimalist logo featuring two abstract, flowing lines (representing SYS and TEMPLATE) intertwining to form a balanced, organic shape. The lines could subtly suggest growth or a natural element like a leaf or water ripple. The primary color palette will be used, with a focus on greens and a touch of yellow for energy.

ui_flows.name: Source Selection and Configuration
ui_flows.description: Users select and configure their SYS and TEMPLATE sources. This screen will present clear options for inputting source details (e.g., API endpoints, file paths, credentials).
steps: Source Configuration Form (dynamic fields based on type)
key_interactions: Input fields with clear labels and validation

ui_flows.name: Integration and Weaving Interface
ui_flows.description: This is the core interface where users define how the SYS and TEMPLATE sources will be woven together. It will provide visual tools for mapping and defining logic.
steps: Overview of selected SYS and TEMPLATE sources
Visual Data Mapping Interface (drag-and-drop or similar)
Logic/Rule Definition Area (for transformations and conditional logic)
key_interactions: Clear call-to-action for initiating the weaving process

ui_flows.name: Result and Validation
ui_flows.description: Displays the outcome of the weaving process, including any generated artifacts or reports, and provides options for validation.
steps: Final Output Display (e.g., generated code, merged data)

accessibility_considerations: Sufficient color contrast ratios (minimum 4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text).
Keyboard navigability for all interactive elements.
Clear and descriptive labels for all form fields and controls.
Semantic HTML structure for screen reader compatibility.
Resizable text without loss of content or functionality.
thematic_cohesion: The design will employ a nature-inspired, minimalist theme. Soft gradients, organic shapes, and ample white space will create a calm and focused environment. The use of the defined color palette and typography will be consistent across all screens, reinforcing the brand identity of a seamless and intelligent weaving process.
